recipes.name: Aalu/Karela Bhujiya
recipes.instructions:
Peel and slice potatoes thinly
Slice karela into thin rounds and remove seeds if desired
Heat oil in a pan over medium heat
Add potatoes and karela, cook, stirring occasionally, until tender and lightly crisp
Season to taste and serve

recipes.name: Pork Chilli
recipes.instructions:
Slice pork into bite-sized pieces
Chop tomato, pepper fruit, and onion
Stir-fry pork until browned
Add onion and pepper fruit, cook until softened
Add tomato and ketchup, simmer until saucy and pork is cooked through
Season to taste and serve

recipes.name: Soya veg mix
recipes.instructions:
Soak soybean meal pellets in warm water, then drain
Chop pepper fruit and onion
Sauté onion and pepper fruit until softened
Add soybean meal pellets and ketchup, cook until heated through and well coated
Season to taste and serve

recipes.name: MOMO
recipes.instructions:
Cook frozen momo according to package directions
Chop tomatoes and cook down into a simple sauce
Serve momo with the tomato sauce

recipes.name: Chicken curry
recipes.instructions:
Chop tomato and onion
Brown chicken in a pan
Add onion and cook until softened
Add tomato and simmer until the chicken is cooked through and sauce thickens
Season to taste and serve

recipes.name: Pasta sauce
recipes.instructions:
Brown minced chicken in a pan
Add canned pasta sauce and simmer
Stir in frozen vegetables and cook until tender
Season to taste and serve

recipes.name: Lamb curry
recipes.instructions:
Chop tomato
Brown goat meat in a pan
Add tomato and simmer until meat is tender and sauce thickens
Season to taste and serve

recipes.name: Gundruk soup
recipes.instructions:
Soak gundruk and dried soya in warm water, then drain
Chop tomato, onion, and potato
Sauté onion until softened
Add tomato, potato, gundruk, and dried soya
Add water and simmer until potato is tender
Season to taste and serve

recipes.name: Masyoura
recipes.instructions:
Soak masyoura if needed, then drain
Chop tomato, onion, and potato
Sauté onion until softened
Add tomato, potato, and masyoura
Add water and simmer until potato is tender and masyoura is cooked through
Season to taste and serve

recipes.name: Cream pasta
recipes.instructions:
Cook pasta according to package directions
Sauté onion and bacon bits until fragrant
Add chosen meat and cook until done
Stir in cream and parmesan, simmer until slightly thickened
Toss with pasta and serve

recipes.name: Gundruk aachar
recipes.instructions:
Soak gundruk and dried soya in warm water, then drain
Chop tomato
Sauté tomato briefly, then add gundruk and dried soya
Cook until warmed through
Season to taste and serve

recipes.name: Fried mushroom
recipes.instructions:
Soak dried mushrooms in warm water, then drain
Sauté mushrooms in a pan until lightly crisp
Season to taste and serve

recipes.name: Kerau aalu
recipes.instructions:
Chop potato, tomato, and onion
Sauté onion until softened
Add potato and cook until tender
Stir in tomato and cook until softened
Season to taste and serve

recipes.name: Samosa chaat
recipes.instructions:
Cook frozen samosa according to package directions
Boil or sauté potatoes until tender
Chop tomato and onion
Assemble samosa with potato, tomato, and onion
Season to taste and serve

recipes.name: Cauli potato curry
recipes.instructions:
Chop potato, cauliflower, tomato, and onion
Sauté onion until softened
Add potato and cauliflower, cook until tender
Stir in tomato and cook until softened
Season to taste and serve
